entry.title: What is this site for anyway?
entry.summary: I have a lot of things in progress, delivered internally at work, delivered as open source and some
entry.content:
I have a lot of things in progress, delivered internally at work, delivered as open source and some that I just want to share with the world.

This site is a place for me to share all of that but also act as my own personal portal to things I need all the time, yet forget even where I delivered or found them.

In a nutshell, it will be mostly Github Actions and Reusable workflows for various projects. Often I produce something at work and need to replicate it with any internal stuff removed. Sometimes I will deliver it first here and then customise it internally for work.

Other times I will just come up with random scripts, find great references or need to write some code to glue something together - with a central place to store it all.

Hopefully, others will find it useful too - but even if they don't ... I will have at least one happy user, me!

This site will be the documentation and references for the things in the repo. It's built using the fantastic Docusaurus extensively at work and it is a great tool for easily producing not only documentation, but AUTOMATED documentation - which is a godsend instead of needing to manually copy paste inputs, outputs, screenshots etc.
